name: Universe Of Gamers
description: $UOG (Universe of Gamers) is a revolutionary utility token that bridges the fast-growing online gaming industry with the world of crypto investment. Built on the fast, scalable, and low-cost Solana blockchain, $UOG fuels a sustainable and interconnected ecosystem of NFT games, digital assets, and developer tools. The project is committed to delivering real, functional blockchain-gaming integration, not just hype.
